name: boy (HnHGames)
description:
Welcome to the boy itch.io page!

boy is a small indie game that's been worked on since roughly late 2019. It takes a normal RPG game in 1-bit and makes a small yet entertaining world out of it.

Story of boy:

boy was young and he lived in a small house inside a rocky forest far from any civilisation with his two parents, father and mother.

boy worked everyday with his trusty sword hunting animals for his family to cook and eat everyday.

However, one day boy returned home finding father and mother had disappeared.

There was a note left on the floor which said thus:

GREETINGS, boy. father AND mother HAVE UNFORTUNATELY BEEN TAKEN; THIS WAS AN UNFORTUNATE NECESSITY DUE TO OUR LACK OF STAFF AT MAN INC. THEIR CONTRACT STATES THEY WILL WORK WITH US UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE AND THANK YOU FOR YOUR COOPERATION AND GOOD LUCK IN YOUR FUTURE ENDEAVOURS. - SIGNED, MAN

This is the beginning of the story of boy, his journey to defeat MAN, and the safe return of father and mother. 

HELMETS AND HORNS 'TEAM'/boy CREDITS
